One of the quiet figures on the other side of the room started hitting
some=
thing metal... he repeately hit it until it a part of it fell off
on the fl=
oor.  Then there was a sound of a door opening and hurried
footsteps.  Pers=
eus followed and discovered that they had found a way
out; however the hall=
 was still dark.

He followed the others until they found a shaft of light =
coming in. 
Everyone gathered in front of it.  Upon close examination, that=
 light
was coming from a crack in another door.  While they worked on the
d=
oor, Perseus continued trying to call out with his radio.
